name: Buster Monkeys
description:
Buster Monkeys is a game born out of love for older games that took all our coins in the arcades. The basic gameplay idea from Pang (Buster Bros.) combined with our love for various space shooters were the inspirations that led us to create Buster Monkeys.

Fly your spaceship around the ring and pop all the bubbles to complete the level. Collect stars to buy upgraded spaceships.

Controls can be configured in-game.

If you enjoy playing the demo, please join our mailing list to receive a notification when the full game launches.
